dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: I was sad to see Bob go, but I hope we can all move forward and focus on surviving together in this game. I have no information about who the assassin is or last night's events.

dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I'm deeply saddened by Bob's untimely demise. Let's work together to uncover the identity of the assassin and ensure their elimination from the game. Any clues or suspicions, Diana or Charlie

dialogue.speaker: Diana

dialogue.speaker: Charlie
